title: Zombie Hide Sex
original_name: ゾンビ・ハイド・セックス
sinopse:
Out of nowhere, zombies begin to appear in the city, so Mishiba, a simple store clerk, ends up running away. When he is about to die, Chigasaki, an attractive young man who is part of the JSDF (Japan Self-Defense Force), saves his life. But in exchange for continuing to protect him, he asks him to lend him his thighs so he can masturbate...?! A BL story full of eroticism and zombies!

(Source: MU)
